Verses: 1 en Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummai Nambiyirukkiren; Ennaith Thunbappaduththugiravargal Ellaarukkum Ennai Vilakki Ratchiyum.
2 saththuru Singampol En Aaththumaavaip Pidiththukkondupoi, Viduvikkiravan Illaamaiyaal, Adhaip Peeraadhapadikku Ennaith Thappuviyum.
3 en Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Naan Idhai Seydhadhum, En Kaigalil Niyaayakkedirukkiradhum,
4 ennode Samaadhaanamaayirundhavanukku Naan Theemaiseydhadhum, Kaaranamillaamal Enakku Saththuruvaanavanai Naan Kollaiyittadhum Undaanaal,
5 pagaignan En Aaththumaavaith Thodarndhupidiththu, En Piraananaith Tharaiyile Thalli Mithiththu, En Magimaiyaith Thoolile Thaazhththakkadavan. (selaa.)
6 karththaave, Neer Ummudaiya Kobaththil Ezhundhirundhu, En Saththurukkaludaiya Moorkkangalinimiththam Ummai Uyarththi, Enakkaaga Vizhiththukkollum; Niyaayaththeerppai Niyamiththirukkireere.
7 janakkoottam Ummai Soozhndhukollum; Avargalukkaagath Thirumbavum Unnathaththirku Ezhundharulum.
8 karththar Janangalukku Niyaayanseyvaar; Karththaave, En Needhiyinpadiyum Ennilulla Unmaiyinpadiyum Enakku Niyaayanseyyum.
9 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Pollaangai Ozhiyappannum; Needhimaanai Sthirappaduththuveeraaga; Needhiyullavaraayirukkira Dhevareer Irudhayangalaiyum Ullindhiriyangalaiyum Sothiththarigiravar.
10 semmaiyaana Irudhayamullavargalai Ratchikkira Dhevanidaththil En Kedagam Irukkiradhu.
11 dhevan Needhiyulla Niyaayaadhipadhi; Avar Naaldhorum Paaviyinmel Sinangollugira Dhevan.
12 avan Mananthirumbaavittaal Avar Thammudaiya Pattayaththaik Karukkaakkuvaar; Avar Thammudaiya Villai Naanetri, Adhai Aayaththappaduththiyirukkiraar.
13 avanukku Maranaayudhangalai Aayaththampanninaar; Thammudaiya Ambugalai Akkini Ambugalaakkinaar.
14 idho, Avan Akkiramaththaip Perak Karppavedhanaippadugiraan; Theevinaiyaik Karppandhariththu, Poiyaip Perugiraan.
15 kuzhiyai Vetti, Adhai Aazhamaakkinaan; Thaan Vettina Kuzhiyil Thaane Vizhundhaan.
16 avan Theevinai Avan Sirasinmel Thirumbum, Avan Kodumai Avan Uchchanthalaiyinmel Irangum.
17 naan Karththarai Avarudaiya Needhiyinpadi Thudhiththu, Unnadhamaana Karththarudaiya Naamaththaik Keerththanam Pannuven.
